item.title: Course schedule
item.description: Course schedule — Foundations of psycholinguistics Session 1: What is psycholinguistics? What do psycholinguists investigate? Session 2: Why investigate linguistic meaning using psycholinguistic tools? — Language production Session 3: Processes and models Session 4: Methods — Language comprehension Session 5: Processes and models Session 6: Methods Session 7: Methods — Computational psycholinguistics Session 8: Modeling psycholinguistic data — Selected readings
